mapper.select: select e.name as "exerciseName" , l.log_id as logId , l.log_date as logDate , l.reps as reps , l.sets as sets , l.weight as weight , l.exercise_id as exerciseId , l.is_checked as isChecked , l.duration_minutes as durationMinutes , l.user_id as userId , l.routine_exercise_id as routineExerciseId from fitfusion_exercise_logs l, fitfusion_exercises e where user_id = #{userId} and l.exercise_id = e.exercise_id order by l.log_date desc
